sources.title: Priyatama.(1977)
sources.description: PRIYATAMA, HINDI CLASSIC MOVIE, 1977,Â  Priyatama is a 1977 Hindi love story starring Jeetendra, Neetu Singh, Rakesh Roshan. Ravi and Dolly marry each other after a long courtship. But soon misunderstandings arise and their marriage is on the rocks. They opt for divorce. They don't listen to their friends also. But Dolly's father Justice Sinha visits them for his heart treatment. The two are forced to act like a happily married couple in front of him. He sees through their act and wants to ensure that they don't separate permanently.
